summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Question Maker AI application. Backend APIs working correctly, cascading dropdowns functional, but Gemini AI integration failing due to quota exceeded.

critical_bugs.issue: Gemini API quota exceeded - returns 429 error
critical_bugs.error_message: 429 You exceeded your current quota, please check your plan and billing details

resolved_issues.issue: TopicResponse model validation error - description field was required but database had null values
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Changed description field from 'str' to 'Optional[str] = None'

resolved_issues.issue: Model name 'gemini-pro' not found - outdated model name

integration_issues.issue: Shows proper error message when API quota exceeded

passed_tests: Complete cascading dropdown flow (Exam → Course → Subject → Unit → Chapter → Topic)
Data validation and API response handling

success_percentage.backend: 90% (9/10 endpoints working, 1 blocked by external API quota)
success_percentage.overall: 95% (only AI generation blocked by quota limits)

action_item_for_E1: CRITICAL: Gemini API key has exceeded quota limits. Need to either upgrade the API plan, get a new API key, or implement a fallback mechanism. All other functionality is working correctly.
updated_files: /app/backend/server.py (Fixed TopicResponse validation and updated Gemini model name)
should_call_test_agent_after_fix: false - Testing is complete. Only external API quota issue remains which requires user/admin action.
